title: Printer's Sample Book, 1879–80
inscribed: Written in pencil "H.E. Stevens. Pacific House"
creditline: Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts
description: Small notebook with handwritten formulas for dyestuffs to used for printed textiles. Contains 96 samples of textiles in various designs, mostly small motifs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Printer's Sample Book, 1879–80.
1879–80. Medium: leather, paper, cotton. Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts. 1945-55-40.
